item-attributes.item-attribute: GRDN, CRSB, KNOC, SPRM, RVR, RNGR, CLRC, DRU, SHMN, BTLM, PLDN, SCT, HLR, WAR

tier.tier-desc: Round shields incorporated an arm strap in addition to a handgrip to help distribute the weight. Made of wood, but reinforced along the side with metal. They are still cumbersome, but are able to block many incoming blows.

tier.tier-desc: Heavy shields are often large enough to cover the entire body. Far too heavy for dexterous combat, they are mostly used for protection from projectile weapons during advances.
